arCallbacks.unk_28bc3c5:
function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)

	idNizaarClone = Hydra.CreatePersonalClone(actorNizaarGibbet)
	
	if Hydra.ActorIsValid(idNizaarClone) then
		Hydra.QActorClearAnimSetOverride(idNizaarClone)
		Hydra.QActorFaceSameAsActor(idNizaarClone, actorNizaarFree)
		Hydra.QActorDeletePersonalClone(idNizaarClone, 0.0, actorNizaarFree)
	end
	
end

function Start(idActorPlayer, idActorGizmo)

	Hydra.SetPlayerVariableString(idActorPlayer, "QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_WeaponPicked", "Bow")
	followerNizaar = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_NizaarFollower_Unarmed")
	Hydra.QuestFollowerTakeOwnership(followerNizaar)
	Hydra.QActorSetLoadout(followerNizaar, id2HBow)
	Hydra.QActorWait(followerNizaar,1)
	Hydra.QActorPlayConversation(convNizaarReady, idActorPlayer, followerNizaar)
	Hydra.EventSend("Armed", idActorPlayer)
	
end

function Start(idActor, idActorDetector)

	local followerNizaar = Hydra.QuestGetFollower("QST_Step_PoundofFlesh_NizaarFollower_Unarmed")
	Hydra.QActorPlayConversation(convBowCallout, idActor, followerNizaar)
	
end

function Start(sEventName, idActor, nUserParam)

	Hydra.ActorEnableAI(followerNizaar, false)
	Hydra.QActorMoveToLocationDynamicSpeed(followerNizaar, NizaarDungeonLoc, "NPC_Run", true)
	Hydra.QActorFadeAndDelete(followerNizaar, 0.5)
	
end
